meanings.definition: In a silly or light-hearted manner
meanings.sent1: She giggled frivolously during the comedy show.
meanings.sent2: The children played frivolously in the park.
meanings.sent3: The clown acted frivolously to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her jokes flowed frivolously, bringing smiles to all.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons floated frivolously in the air.
